name: p5.beholder
description: A p5 library to facilitate using the Beholder system for Aruco marker detection.

scripts.build:all: npx webpack --mode production --node-env production && npx webpack --mode development --node-env development
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc -a all -R README.md -c jsdoc.json -r ./src/p5.beholder.js -d docs && jsdoc2md --files ./src/p5.beholder.js > docs/API.md

author: Enric Granzotto Llagostera
